position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 9361826, 'name': 'Bravis ziekenhuis', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEMh8H4YfC9nA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519872567600?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=NYmSwCa9pacQ-8h9M3anceD2bhbuKADKQfuT-w9mZ3k', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bravis-ziekenhuis/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Roosendaal Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Bravis ziekenhuis', 'description': 'General cardiology including a.o. coronary syndromes, heart failure, heart valve problems, heart rhythm problems, pacemakers, adult congenital heart disease, cardiovascular prevention & rehabilitation. Diagnosis, treatment and follow up of patients in clinic and policlinic (Roosendaal and Etten-Leur). Covering acute care of heart/cardiovascular problems with nine fellow cardiologist and specialized nurses in a hospital setting. 

Current projects (and fields of interest) I participate in representing my fellow cardiologists in the Franciscus hospital Roosendaal:
- Cardiac Function Department (both Transthoracic Echocardiography/TTE and Transesophageal Echocardiography/TEE, Contrast Echocardiography, Electrocardiocardiography Exercise Testing and Electrocardiographic Continuous and Event Monitoring)
- Radiology Department (Coronary CT Scan program and setting up Cardiac MRI program)
- Nuclear Medicine Department (nuclear SPECT and PET/CT scanning for diagnosing a.o. scar, ischemia and viability)
- Cardiac Rehabilitation Department located in the Department of Physiotherapy
- Death Rate working group: analyzing all (avoidable?) in hospital mortality
- Novel Oral Anticoagulant/NOAC working group
- Thrombosis & Hemostasis working group
- Key user (for cardiologist group Bravis RdL): Digital Cardiology Information System integrated in Chipsoft/HIX 6.0 Hospital Information System, "go live" Oct. 25th 2013 in Bravis hospital
- Focus Group Myocardial Infarction Noord-Brabant
- Participate in NVVC Connect! ACS program as contact for cardiologist group Bravis RdL

Together with fellow cardiologists I participate as Principal Investigator (PI) in scientific multicenter patient research. We are a member of the WCN, Dutch Network for Cardiovascular Research ('Werkgroep Cardiologische Centra Nederland'/WCN).', 'title': 'Cardiologist, MD PhD', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 249887, 'name': 'Maasstadziekenhuis', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE3FQcMEcnCxA/company-logo_400_400/0/1580897445737?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=Q9d18UjthKHL5rVu-xaQFwCFY_L2pyxg3tR-pJ4HTMg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/maasstadziekenhuis/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Maasstad Ziekenhuis', 'description': None, 'title': 'Cardiologist, MD PhD -
